item.description:
Spring is almost here! It's warm enough (for some) to be running outside and warming up those winter bones.

As the weather warms up, the Meetups will be scheduled to an earlier time (eventually to 8:30 AM). However, since it still fairly cold, hopefully with the later start time, the sun has warmed up the day a bit.

Weekend Meetups are informal and unstructured - show up and play with whoever else shows up. Open to all levels.

Please contact Susan (Asst Organizer) if you are willing to host this Meetup. Thanks.
item.name: Sun @ Crosby, First Weekend of the 2013 Season
